analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0xdd82b2fdd28c2117f4105fca0802fba2a1716843.sol:
	Contract RPKCOIN has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0xdd82b2fdd28c2117f4105fca0802fba2a1716843.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0xdd82b2fdd28c2117f4105fca0802fba2a1716843.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
